mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reserve (korName, engName, phone, email, bigMidCategory, smallEtcCategory, reserveDateAndTime, reservePeople, preCharge, localCharge, currentTime) VALUES ( #{korName}, #{engName}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{bigMidCategory}, #{smallEtcCategory}, #{reserveDateAndTime}, #{reservePeople}, #{preCharge}, #{localCharge}, now() )
